title: hacked acc
body: Somebody enters my account I can not change the mail address or password. because my old address does not exist is also hacked ... please help someone ... I would like to help someone to transfer this mail address to a new ... old mail on which the game no longer exists .....

replies.body: Hey don't worry, we can help!  It looks like you already sent us a ticket, so our account team can help update your info and get it back into your hands.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
